title: I see dark color distortion on the display and it is very evident for black color. This is Pixel 3XL
content:
You can see the discoloration clearly in this picture. While video chatting or in photos I can see this.
Previously I thought it is a software issue, now even after April 2020 update it is evident.

My wife also has a Pixel 3XL and I can see this starting in her phone as well. Please suggest.
I can only see this growing and making the phone completely useless.
